data.title: "Stu's Show" Internet TV Broadcasts
data.text:
DECEMBER 31, 2019

NEW YEAR'S EVE

WITH STU AND JEANINE

WE RANG IN 2020 WITH A FULL SIX-HOUR MARATHON WITH COMEDY AND

TALK, VIEWER E-MAILS AND PHONE CALLS, AUDIENCE PRIZES, PLUS A

FABULOUS GROUP OF CELEBRITY GUESTS - FILMMAKERS CJ WALLIS AND

MALLORY KENNEDY, ACTOR JOEY D. VIEIRA AND HIS SON, BEAU, TV

HISTORIAN JOEL TATOR, MEDIA CRITICS STEVE BEVERLY AND WESLEY

HYATT...AND ANNOUNCER

RANDY WEST.

JANUARY 22, 2020

Guests: GARY GOLTZ, RALPH SCHILLER, and MIKE CLARK

A LOOK BACK AT THE CLASSIC 1950S CRIME DRAMA SHOW, "HIGHWAY

PATROL". GARY AND RALPH'S NEW BOOK DESCRIBES THE HISTORY OF THE SERIES AND THIS EDITION OF

STU'S SHOW GOES INTO GREAT DETAIL ABOUT IT AND FEATURES MANY

CLIPS. PLUS...MIKE CLARK (DOCUMENTARIAN) DISCUSSES HOW

THE SHOW WAS PRODUCED AND TALKS ABOUT HIS OWN DOCUMENTARY

ON GARY'S LOVE OF THE SERIES.

FEBRUARY 19, 2020

Guests: EVELYN RUDIE

and CHRIS DE CARLO

FORMER CHILD ACTRESS EVELYN RUDIE AND HER HUSBAND, WRITER-

DIRECTOR CHRIS DE CARLO TALK ABOUT THEIR PARTNERSHIP IN

THE SANTA MONICA PLAYHOUSE, AND EVELYN SHARES MEMORIES OF

OF WORKING ON TV AND IN THE MOVIES WITH GROUCHO MARX, RED

SKELTON, LAUREN BACALL, ROBERT STACK, EFREM ZIMBALIST, JR.,

GEORGE GOBEL, ALFRED HICHCOCK, LOUIS JOURDAN, AND MANY MORE!

APRIL 15, 2020

Guest: MARC COPAGE

FORMER CHILD ACTOR MARC COPAGE TALKS ABOUT HIS YEARS PLAYING DIAHANN CARROLL ON THE NBC-TV SITCOM, "JULIA", AS WELL AS THE RELATIONSHIP HE HAD WITH HER OFF SCREEN.

MAY 27, 2020

Guest: ED ASNER

MULTIPLE EMMY WINNER ED ASNER TALKS ABOUT HIS NEW AUTOBIOGRAPHY ("SON OF A JUNKMAN") AND HIS LONG CAREER PRIOR TO BECOMING LOU GRANT ON "THE MARY TYLER MOORE SHOW". INCLUDED ARE CLIPS FROM "THE UNTOUCHABLES", "GUNSMOKE", "THE MOD SQUAD", AND MORE.

JUNE 24, 2020

Guest: DR. DEMENTO

THE LEGENDARY RADIO PERSONALITY CELEBRATES HIS 50TH ANNIVERSARY ON THE AIR WITH A LOOK BACK AT HIS CAREER AND HIS IMPRESSIVE RECORD COLLECTING. HE ALSO PRESENTS A SPECIAL VIDEO TOP TEN HE COMPILED ESPECIALLY FOR "STU'S SHOW".

SEPTEMBER 30, 2020

Guest: KAREN DOTRICE

15TH SEASON PREMIERE! ACTRESS/DISNEY LEGEND KAREN DOTRICE TALKS ABOUT WORKING ON "MARY POPPINS", "THE THREE LIVES OF THOMASINA", AND "THE GNOME MOBILE" AS WELL AS HER WORK ON "UPSTAIRS, DOWNSTAIRS" AND "THE THIRTY NINE STEPS" REMAKE.

NOVEMBER 11, 2020

Guests: JOHN BARBOUR and STEVE BEVERLY

TV PERSONALITY JOHN BARBOUR AND MEDIA CRITIC STEVE BEVERLY COMPARE WHAT THE PUBLIC SAW ON TELEVISION WHEN JFK WAS ASSASSINATED ON 11-22-63 TO WHAT JOHN'S RESEARCH UNCOVERED REGARDING WHO WAS REALLY BEHIND IT ALL IN HIS DOCUMENTARY, "THE AMERICAN MEDIA AND THE 2ND ASSASSINATION OF JFK".

JANUARY 20, 2021

Guests: MARTIN GRAMS, JR. and MARK MAXWELL-SMITH

REMEMBERING THE AUDIENCE PARTICIPATION PROGRAM, "TRUTH OR CONSEQUENCES", WHICH BEGAN ON RADIO IN 1940 AND MADE BOB BARKER A HOUSEHOLD NAME WHEN IT TRANSITIONED TO TELEVISION. MARTIN'S BOOK TRACES THE ENTIRE HISTORY OF THE PROGRAM, AND MARK SHARES HIS MEMORIES OF WORKING ON THE SERIES AS A WRITER IN THE EARLY 1970s.

FEBRUARY 3, 2021

Guest: WESLEY HYATT

WESLEY HYATT DISCUSSES HIS NEW BOOK, "BETTY WHITE ON TV", AND WE TAKE A FOND LOOK BACK AT RARE CLIPS OF BETTY'S ON CAMERA WORK FROM NEARLY 70 YEARS OF TELEVISION APPEARANCES INCLUDING SITCOMS, TALK SHOWS, GAME SHOWS, VARIETY, AND DRAMATIC PROGRAMS.

APRIL 14, 2021

Guests: SCOTT & LISA LAND

MASTER PUPPETEER SCOTT AND HIS WIFE, ARTIST LISA EXPLORE THE HISTORY OF PUPPETS ON TV OVER THE YEARS (VIA FILM CLIPS) AND ALSO TALK ABOUT SCOTT'S FANTASTIC CAREER AS A MARIONETTE CREATOR, RESTORER, AND PERFORMER FOR THE PAST 40 YEARS IN MOVIES AND TV...AND FOR SOME OF THE BIGGEST STARS IN HOLLYWOOD. HE ALSO PERFORMS PART OF HIS ACT.

JULY 21, 2021

Guest: RUTA LEE

THE WONDERFUL RUTA LEE DISCUSSES HER NEW BOOK, "CONSIDER YOUR ASS KISSED" AND TALKS ABOUT HER WORK ON CLASSIC SERIES SUCH AS "THE BURNS AND ALLEN SHOW", "HIGHWAY PATROL", "THE LUCY SHOW", "THE ANDY GRIFFITH SHOW", "MANNIX", "GUNSMOKE", AND MANY OTHERS.

OCTOBER 13, 2021

Guests: TOM WATSON

AND RICK CARL

THE 16TH SEASON PREMIERE FEATURES A SALUTE TO THE 70TH ANNIVERSARY OF "I LOVE LUCY" WITH DISCUSSIONS OF BEHIND- THE-SCENES EVENTS IN THE LIVES OF LUCILLE BALL AND DESI ARNAZ, INCLUDING THE RED SCARE OF 1953. THE SHOW ALSO FEATURES RARE CLIPS OF ALL THE PRINCIPLE ACTORS.

MAY 4, 2022

Guest: JOHN BARBOUR

FILM CRITIC JOHN BARBOUR SHARES SOME OF HIS HILARIOUS REVIEWS OF MOVIES FROM THE 70S - "SMOKEY AND THE BANDIT", "GODFATHER II", AND "ANNIE HALL" - AMONG OTHERS, AND EXPLAINS WHY HE TRASHED SOME OF THE INDUSTRY'S BEST-LOVED MOTION PICTURES. HE ALSO REVIEWS THE NEW "STU'S SHOW" DOCUMENTARY AND WE CELEBRATE HIS 89TH BIRTHDAY.

MAY 18, 2022

Guests: CJ WALLIS, MALLORY KENNEDY, AND JEANINE KASUN

CJ WALLIS (THE DIRECTOR) AND MALLORY KENNEDY (THE PRODUCER) OF THE "STU'S SHOW DOCUMENTARY", DISCUSS THE PROJECT'S GENESIS AND THE HURDLES THEY ENCOUNTERED DURING PRODUCTION. ALSO: CO-SUBJECT JEANINE KASUN TALKS MORE ABOUT HER NEAR-FATAL BRAIN ANEURYSM, THE PREMISE OF THE SECOND PART OF THE FILM.

SEPTEMBER 7, 2022

Guests: SHARON BAIRD

AND BEVERLY WASHBURN

ORIGINAL "MICKEY MOUSE CLUB" MOUSEKETEER SHARON BAIRD DISCUSSES HER LONG CAREER, WHICH ALSO INCLUDED WORKING WITH EDDIE CANTOR, JOAN DAVIS, AND SID AND MARTY KROFFT. ACTRESS BEVERLY WASHBURN MAKES A GUEST APPEARANCE AND TALKS ABOUT HER LONG FRIENDSHIP WITH SHARON, AND SHE SHARES MEMORIES OF TOMMY KIRK, TONY DOW, AND JOHNNY CRAWFORD.

OCTOBER 12, 2022

Guest: TOM WATSON

17TH SEASON PREMIERE! PART 1 OF 2. LUCILLE BALL'S FORMER PUBLICIST TOM WATSON RETURNS AND PROVIDES AN ORAL HISTORY OF HOW "THE LUCY SHOW" GOT ON THE AIR - HOW HER ORIGINAL WRITERS WERE RE-SIGNED, HOW VIVIAN VANCE WAS PERSUADED TO RETURN, AND HOW DESI ARNAZ WAS REMOVED AS PRESIDENT OF DESILU. RARE CLIPS PLUS SEASON HIGHLIGHTS FROM YEARS 1,2, AND 3 ARE ALSO FEATURED.

OCTOBER 26, 2022

Guest: TOM WATSON

LUCILLE BALL'S FORMER PUBLICIST TOM WATSON CONTINUES HIS ORAL HISTORY ON LUCY'S SECOND TV SERIES, "THE LUCY SHOW". TOPICS INCLUDE THE FORMAT CHANGE FOR THE SERIES WHEN VIVIAN VANCE LEFT, THE "LUCY IN LONDON" SPECIAL, THE ISSUES LUCY HAD WITH JOAN CRAWFORD, AND THE SALE OF DESILU TO PARAMOUNT...PLUS SEASON HIGHLIGHTS FROM YEARS 4,5, AND 6. APRIL 19, 2023

Guest: BRUCE BELLAND

THE LEAD SINGER OF THE FOUR PREPS, BRUCE BELLAND, RECALLS HOW THE GROUP WAS FORMED, HOW IT SKYROCKETED TO SUCCESS WITH APPEARANCES ON "THE ADVENTURES OF OZZIE AND HARRIET" AND WITH A CAPITOL RECORDS CONTRACT, ALL CHRONICLED IN BRUCE'S NEW AUTOBIOGRAPHY, "ICONS, IDOLS, AND IDIOTS OF HOLLYWOOD". JUNE 28, 2023

Guest: TINA COLE

ACTRESS/SINGER TINA COLE SHARES MEMORIES OF HER ROLE AS KATIE DOUGLAS ON "MY THREE SONS", WHICH INCLUDED A REAL LIFE LOVE AFFAIR WITH HER CO-STAR DON GRADY. SHE ALSO TALKS ABOUT SINGING WITH HER FAMOUS KING FAMILY RELATIVES, AND WORKING ON "HAWAIIAN EYE", ALL CHRONICLED IN HER NEW BOOK, "MY THREE LIVES". JULY 12, 2023

Guest: KATHY GARVER

ACTRESS/AUTHOR KATHY GARVER TALKS ABOUT HER CURRENT WORK, INCLUDING BOTH ON CAMERA AND VOICEOVER PRODUCTIONS AND THE RECENT RELEASE OF HER "FAMILY AFFAIR SCRAPBOOK", PLUS A FULL BEHIND-THE-SCENES DISCUSSION ON THE CLASSIC TV SERIES. CLIPS ARE SCREENED OF KATHY'S "TOP SEVEN" ALL-TIME FAVORITE EPISODES. OCTOBER 25, 2023

Guest: TOM WATSON

18TH YEAR PREMIERE SHOW! LUCILLE BALL'S FORMER PUBLICIST TOM WATSON RETURNS TO THE PROGRAM TO PROVIDE AN OVERVIEW OF LUCY'S THIRD SERIES, "HERE'S LUCY", ALONG WITH A LOOK AT THE LONG WORKING RELATIONSHIP THAT SHE HAD WITH HER CO-STAR GALE GORDON. APRIL 17, 2024

Guest: ED BEGLEY, JR.

THE EMMY-NOMINATED ACTOR DISCUSSES HIS NEW BOOK, "TO THE TEMPLE OF TRANQUILITY...AND STEP ON IT", WHICH RECOUNTS HIS LIFE AND CAREER INCLUDING HIS PARTS AS A GUEST ACTOR ON TV SERIES, ROLES IN FEATURE FILMS, AND PLAYING DR. VICTOR EHRLICH ON "ST. ELSEWHERE". HE ALSO TALKS ABOUT HIS DRUG AND ALCOHOL ADDICTION IN THE 1970S. JUNE 19, 2024

Guests: JULIAN DAVID STONE

AND ANTONIA CARLOTTA

HISTORIANS JULIAN DAVID STONE AND ANTONIA CARLOTTA PROVIDE AN OVERVIEW OF UNIVERSAL STUDIOS, FROM THE TIME ANTONIA'S GREAT GREAT UNCLE CARL LAEMMLE FOUNDED IT IN 1912, UP TO AND INCLUDING THE MERGER WITH NBC AND COMCAST IN THE 21ST CENTURY. RARE CLIPS, INCLUDING STUDIO TOURS IN 1915 AND 1964 ARE SEEN.
